welcome_message_body: Welcome to Salatiga, a charming city known for its beautiful mountain views, cultural heritage, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Salatiga has to offer during your stay. Selamat datang!

restaurants.name: Sego Kucing Senjoyo
restaurants.description: Sego Kucing Senjoyo is a asian restaurant located in Salatiga.
restaurants.address: Jalan Senjoyo Salatiga, Salatiga, Jawa Tengah

restaurants.name: Susu Segar 39
restaurants.description: Susu Segar 39 is a food truck located in Salatiga.
restaurants.address: Jl. Kemiri I No. 39 (Jl. Cungkup), salatiga, Jawa Tengah 50711

restaurants.name: Singkong Keju D-9
restaurants.description: Singkong Keju D-9 is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Salatiga.

restaurants.name: Wedang Ronde Sekoteng "Jago"

restaurants.name: Istana Mie & Es
restaurants.description: Istana Mie & Es is a indonesian restaurant located in Salatiga.
restaurants.address: Jalan Tol Bawen-Salatiga, Salatiga, Jawa Tengah

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
